SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]はいま 無[む]口[くち]な空[そら]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: I just vomited a cloud named solitude

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 吐[は]き出[だ]した孤[こ]独[どく]という名[な]の雲[くも]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Into the silent sky

SongLyrics.JpnStr: その雲[くも]が雨[あめ]を降[ふ]らせて
SongLyrics.EngStr: That cloud will make it rain

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 虹[にじ]が出[で]る どうせ掴[つか]めないのに
SongLyrics.EngStr: And a rainbow will come out, even though you can't seize it anyway

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 初[はじ]めてのキスを繰[く]り返[かえ]して欲[ほ]しくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want you to repeat our first kiss

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]が僕[ぼく]に噛[か]みついて 離[はな]さないと言[い]うけれど
SongLyrics.EngStr: Love bites me and says it won't let go...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 寂[さび]しさの形[かたち]は変[か]わらないみたいだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: But it seems that the shape of loneliness will never change

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 舞[ま]い上[あ]がって行[ゆ]け 何時[いつ]か夜[よる]の向[む]こう側[がわ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Soar away, someday on the other side of the night

SongLyrics.JpnStr: うんざりする程[ほど]光[ひか]れ君[きみ]の歌[うた]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let your song shine so bright we'll get fed up with it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: やさしさが濁[にご]った日[ひ]々[び]の
SongLyrics.EngStr: The days clouded by kindness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 憂[ゆう]鬱[うつ]は満[まん]員[いん]電[でん]車[しゃ]みたいだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The melancholy is like a crowded train

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 冷[さ]めた温[ぬく]もりを無闇[むやみ]に放[ほう]り投[な]げた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I carelessly tossed away the cold warmth

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]が愛[あい]を信[しん]じても 屹度[きっと]いなくなるんだろう?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I believe in love, you're sure to leave, right?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それならいらない 悲[かな]しいすぎるから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Then I don't want it. It's too sad

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 左[さ]様[よう]ならさえも上手[うま]く言[い]えなそうだから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because I don't think I can even say goodbye well

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 手[て]をふる代[か]わりに抱[だ]きしめてみたよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Instead of waving, try hugging me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 流[なが]れ星[ぼし]を見[み]た 流[なが]れ星[ぼし]を見[み]た
SongLyrics.EngStr: I saw a shooting star I saw a shooting star

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 願[ねが]う僕[ぼく]の歌[うた]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The song of me, who is pleading

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 側[そば]に居[い]る丈[だけ]で本[ほん]当[とう]幸[しあわ]せだったな
SongLyrics.EngStr: Just being beside you, I was really happy

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 側[そば]に居[い]る丈[だけ]でただそれだけでさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Just being beside you, even just that was enough

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]が僕[ぼく]に噛[か]みついて 離[はな]さないと言[い]うけれど
SongLyrics.EngStr: Love bites me and says it won't let go

SongLyrics.JpnStr: さみしさのカタチは変[か]わらないみたいだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: But it seems that the shape of loneliness will never change

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 舞[ま]い上[あ]がって行[ゆ]け 何時[いつ]か夜[よる]の向[む]こう側[がわ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Soar away, someday on the other side of the night

SongLyrics.JpnStr: うんざりする程[ほど]光[ひか]れ君[きみ]の歌[うた]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let your song shine so bright we'll get fed up with it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もう傷[きず]つかない もう傷[きず]つけない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I won't get hurt anymore, I won't hurt you anymore

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 光[ひか]れ君[きみ]の歌[うた]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let your song shine

ListVocab: 変わらない-かわらない
舞い上がる-まいあがる
満員電車-まんいんでんしゃ
